com.icfolson.aem.library.core.components

Class AbstractComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icfolson.aem.library.core.components.AbstractComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Accessible, ImageSource, Inheritable, Linkable, BasicNode, ComponentNode, Traversable<ComponentNode>

    public abstract class AbstractComponent
extends Object
implements ComponentNode
    Base class for AEM component classes.

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<String> getAsHrefInherited(String propertyName,
                                                                  boolean strict)
        Description copied from interface: Inheritable
        Given a property on this node containing the path of another resource, get the href to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this component. Use this method with a true argument when appending ".html" to the resource path is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths.
        Specified by:
        getAsHrefInherited in interface Inheritable
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have ".html" appended
        Returns:
        Optional href

      • getAsHref

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<String> getAsHref(String propertyName,
                                                         boolean strict)
        Description copied from interface: Accessible
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get an Optional containing the href to the resource. Use this method with a true argument when appending ".html" to the resource path is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths.
        Specified by:
        getAsHref in interface Accessible
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have ".html" appended
        Returns:
        href value wrapped in an Optional

      • getAsHrefInherited

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<String> getAsHrefInherited(String propertyName,
                                                                  boolean strict,
                                                                  boolean mapped)
        Description copied from interface: Inheritable
        Given a property on this node containing the path of another resource, get the href to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this component. Use this method with a true argument when appending ".html" to the resource path is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths. Setting mapped to true will map the path value, if it exists, through the Sling Resource Resolver.
        Specified by:
        getAsHrefInherited in interface Inheritable
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have ".html" appended
        mapped - if true, the property value will be routed through the Resource Resolver to determine the mapped path for the value. For example, if a mapping from "/content/" to "/" exists in the Apache Sling Resource Resolver Factory OSGi configuration, getting the mapped href for the path "/content/citytechinc" will return "/citytechinc.html".
        Returns:
        Optional href

      • getAsHref

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<String> getAsHref(String propertyName,
                                                         boolean strict,
                                                         boolean mapped)
        Description copied from interface: Accessible
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get an Optional containing the href to the resource. Use this method with a true argument when appending ".html" to the resource path is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths. Setting mapped to true will map the path value, if it exists, through the Sling Resource Resolver.
        Specified by:
        getAsHref in interface Accessible
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have ".html" appended
        mapped - if true, the property value will be routed through the Resource Resolver to determine the mapped path for the value. For example, if a mapping from "/content/" to "/" exists in the Apache Sling Resource Resolver Factory OSGi configuration, getting the mapped href for the path "/content/citytechinc" will return "/citytechinc.html".
        Returns:
        href value wrapped in an Optional

      • getAsLinkInherited

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<Link> getAsLinkInherited(String propertyName,
                                                                boolean strict)
        Description copied from interface: Inheritable
        Given a property on this node containing the path of another resource, get a link to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this component. Use this method with a true argument when including an extension for the link is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths.
        Specified by:
        getAsLinkInherited in interface Inheritable
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have an extension
        Returns:
        Optional link object, or null if the property does not contain a valid content path

      • getAsLinkInherited

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<Link> getAsLinkInherited(String propertyName,
                                                                boolean strict,
                                                                boolean mapped)
        Description copied from interface: Inheritable
        Given a property on this node containing the path of another resource, get a link to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this component. Use this method with a true argument when including an extension for the link is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths. Setting mapped to true will map the path value, if it exists, through the Sling Resource Resolver.
        Specified by:
        getAsLinkInherited in interface Inheritable
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have an extension
        mapped - if true, the property value will be routed through the Resource Resolver to determine the mapped path for the value. For example, if a mapping from "/content/" to "/" exists in the Apache Sling Resource Resolver Factory OSGi configuration, the Link path will be "/citytechinc" rather than "/content/citytechinc".
        Returns:
        Optional link object, or null if the property does not contain a valid content path

        public <T> com.google.common.base.Optional<T> getInherited(String propertyName,
                                                           Class<T> type)
        Description copied from interface: Inheritable
        Get a property value from the current node. If no value is found, recurse up the content tree respective to the page and relative node path until a value is found, returning an absent Optional if not. This returns the same value as the underlying ValueMap wrapped in an Optional instance instead of returning null.
        Specified by:
        getInherited in interface Inheritable
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        Parameters:
        propertyName - property name
        type - property type
        Returns:
        Optional of the given type containing the property value or absent if no value is found
